Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Content: I talked via email with the company and are very helpful. My order came well before the date said. This is my second cam similar of this and this ONE is the best. Easy set up , better video than my dash cam. Very small and easy to operate. The still's and video in low lite surprised me , doing that good. Will deal from this company again and recommend them and this camera.Thanks for reading.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: John H. Wenner
Reviews.Content: Great product!  Great picture, sound and size.  I was really happy that it records .MOV which is compatible with my MAC.

Reviews.Title: This one is a winner...
Reviews.Author: skydiver22
Reviews.Content: I spent a lot of time trying to decide what camera I would get for my truck to use as a dash cam.. I think I found the perfect choice.. This thing fits the bill perfectly.. Small, easily concealed.I had this camera set up and running in minutes. After you purchase, go to this web site: [[...]] and they will give you all of the information that you need..I set this up in my truck and have been using it everyday. Easily sets up for loop recording and will start recording as soon as you start your car.. I have looked at the 1080P video and was amazed at how great the video was on this little camera..It does get very hot when it is running. I am concerned about this when summer comes in Arizona.. They are working on selling a capacitor battery for use in cars.. The heat is normal and if the heat sync is hot, I guess that means it is doing its job..You cannot go wrong with this camera...
